reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and appreciate that it fits perfectly. The quality and softness receive mixed feedback, with several customers describing it as fantastic and soft.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty. Washes well
items.body: Item as expected. Very pretty Read more
items.author: Irene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and So Soft! ★★★★★
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Adorable and So Soft! ★★★★★This pink sweater is absolutely adorable! The color is a beautiful, soft pink, and the material is so cozy and soft to the touch. What really sets it apart, though, are the cute bows on the back—such a unique and fun sweater. Highly recommend!! Read more
items.author: Always Meliss

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Returned!
items.body: Pros: nice fit & cute bow. Cons: knit requires tank to be worn under sweater otherwise bra will be seen. Material is itchy. Read more
items.author: MDIMama

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute back but that's all
items.body: I love the back. The front was a little boring and left me with no shape. Quality was ok. I don't know how this would wash long term. I ended up returning it. Read more
items.author: Dhara Patel

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Runs small. The quality is also eh. Read more
items.author: sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it
items.body: Very soft, true to size fit. I got lots of compliments. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a good addition to my closet!
items.body: This sweater is adorable and I’ve had so many compliments on it. I would buy another one for sure. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pure Black, Dusty Pink, Pure White, Pure Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
